properties.name: aspect-logging.log-before.enabled
properties.description: Log before enter method. Default value = false

properties.name: aspect-logging.logBefore.log-level
properties.description: Logging level. error, warn, info, debug, trace. Default value = info

properties.name: aspect-logging.log-after-returning.enabled
properties.description: Log after returning answer. Default value = false

properties.name: aspect-logging.log-after-returning.log-level
properties.description: Logging level. error, warn, info, debug, trace. Default value = info

properties.name: aspect-logging.execution-time.enabled
properties.description: Log and calculate execution time. Default value = false

properties.name: aspect-logging.execution-time.log-level
properties.description: Logging level. error, warn, info, debug, trace. Default value = info

properties.name: aspect-logging.catch-exception.enabled
properties.description: Log caught exception. Default value = false

properties.name: aspect-logging.catch-exception.log-level
properties.description: Logging level. error, warn, info, debug, trace. Default value = info
